run_id.description: ID of the run under which to log the metric. Must be provided.

run_uuid.description:
[Deprecated, use run_id instead] ID of the run under which to log the metric. This field will
be removed in a future MLflow version.

value.description: Double value of the metric being logged.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds at the time metric was logged.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Logs a metric for a run. A metric is a key-value pair (string key, float value) with an associated timestamp. Examples include the various metrics that represent ML model accuracy. A metric can be logged multiple times.
